Franklin Devoie

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Franklin Devoe
  2. Foster Name: Franklin
  3. Foster Family: Joseph and Bessie Cook
  4. Foster Family Alt: Joseph Worval and Bessie Belle Olson Cook
  5. Location of Family: Lowell, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  7. Arrival Place: Minden, NE
  8. Age on Arrival: 4
  9. Date of Birth: 1914-08-31, Philadelphia, PA
  10. Gender: male
